thread.title: Bond yields rise & oil prices drop as Syria fears ebb

title: Bond yields rise & oil prices drop as Syria fears ebb
text:
Bond yields rise & oil prices drop as Syria fears ebb Monday, April 16, 2018 - 01:40 
Oil prices fell sharply and government bond yields rose on Monday on the view the weekend's U.S-led missile strikes on Syria were unlikely to mark the start of a broader conflict. Sonia Legg reports ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Oil prices fell sharply and government bond yields rose on Monday on the view the weekend's U.S-led missile strikes on Syria were unlikely to mark the start of a broader conflict.
